scripts.staging:clean: git fetch origin --prune 'refs/tags/*:refs/tags/*' && git push origin --delete $(git tag -l 'staging-*') || true && git fetch origin --prune 'refs/tags/*:refs/tags/*'
scripts.staging:deploy: yarn staging:clean && TAG=`echo staging-$(date +%Y%m%d-%H%M%S)` && git tag $TAG && git push origin $TAG
